name: Zombie Beer
description: Developed by bahamut Games, is a game where the player will face many challenges along with the zombie drunkard, always starting from a bar that is closing the search for other open, tasting beers from different places, trying not to spill beer on the way, let's go and try to not let the beer fall !! The game is being developed and will have several updates! news will come and more stages are being built very soon !!come will enjoy and have fun !
